Class EdgeRoutingManager

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Routing
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Manages edge routing for the FlowCanvas, integrating the Core routing service with the UI layer.

public class EdgeRoutingManager

Methods

ClearAllRoutes(bool)

Clears all waypoints from edges, returning them to default paths.

public void ClearAllRoutes(bool forceRefresh = true)

Parameters

forceRefresh bool

If true, refreshes edge rendering after clearing.

ClearRoutesForNodes(IEnumerable<string>, bool)

Clears waypoints from edges connected to specific nodes. OPTIMIZED: Uses GetEdgesForNodes index for O(k) lookup instead of O(n) iteration.

public void ClearRoutesForNodes(IEnumerable<string> nodeIds, bool forceRefresh = true)

Parameters

nodeIds IEnumerable<string>

IDs of nodes whose connected edges should be cleared.

forceRefresh bool

If true, refreshes edge rendering after clearing.

Called when node dragging completes. Re-routes edges if configured.

public void OnNodesDragCompleted(IEnumerable<string> draggedNodeIds)

Parameters

draggedNodeIds IEnumerable<string>

IDs of nodes that were dragged.

OnNodesDragging(IEnumerable<string>)

Called when nodes are being dragged. Re-routes edges if configured to do so. OPTIMIZED: Uses throttling and edge caching to avoid O(n) iteration on every mouse move.

public void OnNodesDragging(IEnumerable<string> draggedNodeIds)

Parameters

draggedNodeIds IEnumerable<string>

IDs of nodes being dragged.
